title: Hallucination
description: From the bestselling author of Fantasia Barrino's autobiography "Life is Not a Fairytale," ghostwriter Kim Green comes out of the shadows with her debut novel, "hallucination." "hallucination" is a story about unexpected occurrences and how they can stop your life and change it whether you are ready for change or not. This is a story of surviving some of life's unavoidable miseries and coming out on the other side, a little wiser and a little closer to yourself. "hallucination" is a story of regular life, sudden illness and irregular outcomes. "hallucination" is NOT a story about being sick. It's a story of becoming well...inside and out.
author: Kim  Green
